meanings.definition: A person who has never had sexual intercourse.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, virgins are highly valued before marriage.
meanings.sent2: The novel tells the story of a group of virgins on a journey of self-discovery.
meanings.sent3: The comedy movie portrayed a group of virgins trying to navigate the world of dating.
meanings.sent4: Her untouched garden was like a field of virgins waiting to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The image of the untouched snow was as pure and pristine as a group of virgins.

meanings.definition: A person who is inexperienced or naive in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: As a virgins in the art world, she was eager to learn and explore.

meanings.sent3: The group of virgins in the kitchen attempted to cook a gourmet meal with hilarious results.
